feed.title: Comments on Politics with Respect
feed.subtitle: This is not a political blog, but like most bloggers I've been indundated with various discussions about the Bush Administration, Michael Moore, Red vs. Blue, etc. So much so that on some professional email lists we've had to ask the participants to use the text "[POLITICS]" in their subject lines so that we can filter out the overt political content. (post continues with more about why I don't participate much in political discussions, but then points people to a t-shirt statement and a song that I feel are respectful.)
